about_the_game:
Water Planet Original Soundtrack includes the four songs from Water Planet EP and the cinematic score from the game, with an extended instrumental suite. All written and preformed by VIRGO.

Track Listing

01 622514
02 Dissolve
03 hologamma
04 Disappear
05 622514 Reprise
06 Dissolve Reprise
07 hologamma Reprise
08 Disappear Reprise

MP3-format files will be placed in your Water Planet folder in the Steam Directory: ...Steam\steamapps\common\WaterPlanet\Soundtrack
